name: Uta
text:
[Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
[End of Your Turn] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Set up to 1 of your {FILM} type Characters as active.

effect.text: Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Set up to 1 of your {FILM} type Characters as active.
